creator: DatChat
descriptionHtml:
DatChat Messenger protects your privacy with self-destructing, screenshot protected and encrypted messages. Now you can keep your messages private, secure and out of the wrong hands. You can even Un-Send a message anytime you want or “Nuke” an entire conversation. “Nuke” completely eradicates both sides of a conversation for everyone involved.

• Free, Secure and Easy.

• Self-Destructing Messages that give you the options that you need to protect your privacy, while still being able to maintain a normal conversation.

• Screenshot Protection which makes it nearly impossible to screenshot a secret message. Also, the sender receives notifications when someone attempts to screenshot your messages, photos or videos.

• Hide in Plain Sight: Senders can hide pictures and information on the camera roll, hidden and encrypted behind other pictures. Only the cover photo can be seen in plain sight.

• Without a Trace: Messages vanish without a trace when they reach a view limit or are manually destructed, and are deleted forever. DatChat Inc. employees can never access or read messages.

• Encrypted messages are both individually encrypted for the recipient and sent through an end-to-end encrypted connection to the recipient. All messages are encrypted.

• Group and Individual conversations

• Message Security: Only the sender and intended recipients can view messages -- they cannot be forwarded to anyone else.

• Multiple Accounts: Senders can have multiple accounts with friends, messages and secret pictures visible when logged in to that respective account.
descriptionShort: Take control of your privacy

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
We've been working hard to bring you the easiest, most secure & feature rich messenger app on the market! Here's a little bit of what's new our biggest update yet:

Video: You can now send self-destructing, screenshot proof videos with ease!

Quality of life updates including typing indicators, easier settings management, and always-on screenshot protection for image & video messages among just a few.

Upgrade to DatChat Pro to unlock exclusive features and enhancements.

title: DatChat Messenger

creator: DatChat
descriptionHtml:
DatChat Private Social Groups & Messenger protect your privacy with self-destructing, screenshot protected and encrypted posts and messages. Now you can keep your messages and social posts private, secure and out of the wrong hands. You can even Un-Send a message anytime you want or “Nuke” an entire conversation or the comments you added to a group. “Nuke” completely eradicates both sides of a conversation or your comments for everyone involved.

• Free, Secure and Easy.

• Create Social Groups where only you and your invited friends can post, comment and like. It’s just like having your own private social network because only those you allow can read and participate.

• Self-Destructing Messages and Posts that give you the options that you need to protect your privacy, while still being able to maintain a normal conversation.

• Screenshot Protection which makes it nearly impossible to screenshot a secret message, post or cimment. Also, the sender receives notifications when someone attempts to screenshot your messages, photos or videos.

• Hide in Plain Sight: Senders can hide pictures and information on the camera roll, hidden and encrypted behind other pictures. Only the cover photo can be seen in plain sight.

• Without a Trace: Messages and Posts vanish without a trace when they reach a view limit or are manually destructed, and are deleted forever. DatChat Inc. employees can never access or read messages.

• Encrypted messages are both individually encrypted for the recipient and sent through an end-to-end encrypted connection to the recipient. All messages are encrypted.

• Group and Individual conversations

• Message Security: Only the sender and intended recipients can view messages -- they cannot be forwarded to anyone else.

• Multiple Accounts: You can have multiple accounts with friends, messages and secret pictures visible when logged in to that respective account.

____

We now offer DatChat Pro at three membership tiers:
- Monthly: $0.99, renews every month
- Yearly: $9.99, renews annually
- Lifetime: $24.99, one time purchase good for the life of your account

DatChat Pro is an optional subscription service that unlocks new features and removes existing limitations. Subscriptions are offered on a monthly, yearly, and lifetime basis. Monthly subscriptions will renew every month for $0.99. Yearly subscriptions will renew annually for $9.99. A lifetime subscription is a one time payment of$24.99 that does not renew, and will upgrade your status to Pro for the lifetime of your account. Prices may vary by location. Any portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription.

Subscriptions are charged to your credit card through your iTunes account. Manage your subscription in Account Settings after purchase. Monthly and Yearly subscriptions must be cancelled at least 24 hours before the end of the current period to prevent an auto renewal. Once purchased, refunds will not be given for any unused portion of the term.

Terms of Service: http://www.datchat.net/terms
Privacy Policy: http://www.datchat.net/privacy

title: DatChat Messenger

creator: DatChat
descriptionHtml:
DatChat is a private social networking app and messenger that protects your privacy with self-destructing, screenshot protected, encrypted posts and messages.

Security is paramount, get the privacy you deserve to talk freely in your social network. Social posts are kept private, secure, and out of the wrong hands. Messages, social posts and comments cannot be screenshotted due to our proprietary anti-screenshot protection, and if someone tries you will be notified. Every message you send has an end-to-end encrypted connection.

Control over conversations doesn’t stop after you hit send - now you have control even after they are sent. Nuke conversations on both the sender and recipient’s devices to protect your privacy. Messages can be unsent at any time with ease. Messages will vanish without a trace when they reach view limits or are manually destructed.

Stay private on your own form of social network. Group messages and chats can be created where only you and the friends you invite to the group can post, comment, and like. Control how many accounts you have, with whatever friends and family you want. Safe, private messages and pictures are only visible when logged into that respective account.

Privacy is extended even to pictures: only your profile picture is available for anyone to view on DatChat. Encryption means that all of your photos and information are on a private camera roll, hidden behind other pictures. Never worry about picture security again.

Download DatChat today and enjoy free, private, and secure social networking.

DATCHAT FEATURES:

Secure Chat and Messaging:
- Private chat protects your privacy
- Messages & posts are protected from screenshots with propriety anti-screenshot protection
- Receive notifications when someone attempts to screenshot messages, photos or videos
- Secret messages stay between the sender & intended recipients - they can’t be forwarded to others
- Messages have end-to-end encrypted connection

Control Messages:
- Control what happens to messages after you send them
- Nuke messages & completely eradicate both sides of a conversation, comments and more
- Messages and posts are self-destructing for your privacy
- Social posts vanish without a trace when they reach a view limit or are manually destructed

Social Network Security:
- Social Groups are created where only you & your invited friends can post, comment and like
- Multiple accounts for different friends: messages visible when logged into that respective account

Private Pictures:
- Only a cover photo can be seen in plain sight
- Encryption for pictures in a private camera roll, hidden behind other pictures

Download DatChat now and start sending secure, private messages.
__
We now offer DatChat Pro at three membership tiers:
- Monthly: $0.99, renews every month
- Yearly: $9.99, renews annually
- Lifetime: $24.99, one time purchase good for the life of your account

DatChat Pro is an optional subscription service that unlocks new features and removes existing limitations. Subscriptions are offered on a monthly, yearly, and lifetime basis. Monthly subscriptions will renew every month for $0.99. Yearly subscriptions will renew annually for $9.99. A lifetime subscription is a one time payment of$24.99 that does not renew, and will upgrade your status to Pro for the lifetime of your account. Prices may vary by location. Any portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription.

Subscriptions are charged to your credit card through your iTunes account. Manage your subscription in Account Settings after purchase. Monthly and Yearly subscriptions must be cancelled at least 24 hours before the end of the current period to prevent an auto renewal. Once purchased, refunds will not be given for any unused portion of the term.

Privacy Policy: http://www.datchat.net/privacy

title: DatChat: Private Social & Group Messenger App

creator: DatChat
descriptionHtml:
DatChat is a private social networking app and messenger that protects your privacy with self-destructing, screenshot protected, encrypted posts and messages.

Security is paramount, get the privacy you deserve to talk freely in your social network. Social posts are kept private, secure, and out of the wrong hands. Messages, social posts and comments cannot be screenshotted due to our proprietary anti-screenshot protection, and if someone tries you will be notified. Every message you send has an end-to-end encrypted connection.

Control over conversations doesn’t stop after you hit send - now you have control even after they are sent. Nuke conversations on both the sender and recipient’s devices to protect your privacy. Messages can be unsent at any time with ease. Messages will vanish without a trace when they reach view limits or are manually destructed.

Stay private on your own form of social network. Group messages and chats can be created where only you and the friends you invite to the group can post, comment, and like. Control how many accounts you have, with whatever friends and family you want. Safe, private messages and pictures are only visible when logged into that respective account.

Privacy is extended even to pictures: only your profile picture is available for anyone to view on DatChat. Encryption means that all of your photos and information are on a private camera roll, hidden behind other pictures. Never worry about picture security again.

Download DatChat today and enjoy free, private, and secure social networking.

DATCHAT FEATURES:

Secure Chat and Messaging:
- Private chat protects your privacy
- Messages & posts are protected from screenshots with propriety anti-screenshot protection
- Receive notifications when someone attempts to screenshot messages, photos or videos
- Secret messages stay between the sender & intended recipients - they can’t be forwarded to others
- Messages have end-to-end encrypted connection

Control Messages:
- Control what happens to messages after you send them
- Nuke messages & completely eradicate both sides of a conversation, comments and more
- Messages and posts are self-destructing for your privacy
- Social posts vanish without a trace when they reach a view limit or are manually destructed

Social Network Security:
- Social Groups are created where only you & your invited friends can post, comment and like
- Multiple accounts for different friends: messages visible when logged into that respective account

Private Pictures:
- Only a cover photo can be seen in plain sight
- Encryption for pictures in a private camera roll, hidden behind other pictures

Download DatChat now and start sending secure, private messages.
__
We now offer DatChat Pro at three membership tiers:
- Monthly: $0.99, renews every month
- Yearly: $9.99, renews annually
- Lifetime: $24.99, one time purchase good for the life of your account

DatChat Pro is an optional subscription service that unlocks new features and removes existing limitations. Subscriptions are offered on a monthly, yearly, and lifetime basis. Monthly subscriptions will renew every month for $0.99. Yearly subscriptions will renew annually for $9.99. A lifetime subscription is a one time payment of$24.99 that does not renew, and will upgrade your status to Pro for the lifetime of your account. Prices may vary by location. Any portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription.

Subscriptions are charged to your credit card through your iTunes account. Manage your subscription in Account Settings after purchase. Monthly and Yearly subscriptions must be cancelled at least 24 hours before the end of the current period to prevent an auto renewal. Once purchased, refunds will not be given for any unused portion of the term.

Terms of Service: http://www.datchat.net/terms
Privacy Policy: http://www.datchat.net/privacy
descriptionShort: A Safe Online Space for Friends & Groups to Engage in Private Communications

appDetails.recentChangesHtml: We’ve updated the app to include new branding and external linking features to invite friends directly into private group pages.

title: DatChat: Social Network Plus

creator: DatChat
descriptionHtml:
DatChat is a secure social networking app and private messenger that gives you the freedom to talk without worry with self-destructing, screenshot protected, encrypted posts and messages. Text privacy with your social network means control even after you hit send or submit.

Stay safe: DatChat delivers a safe space for private posts and messages with your social network. Social posts are kept secure and out of the wrong hands. Stay private and avoid screenshotting with our proprietary anti-screenshot protection, and receive notifications if someone tries. Group message your friends, family and social network with end-to-end encrypted connection.

Safety first: control over conversations even after you hit send. Stay private even after they are sent. Nuke conversations on both the sender and recipient devices for privacy. Messages can be unsent at any time with ease and vanish without a trace when they reach view limits or are manually destructed.

Group messages and chats can be created where only you and the friends you invite to the group can post, comment and like. Private chat with as many accounts as you’d like friends and family. Safe, private messages and pictures are only visible when logged into that respective account.

Private pictures: only your profile picture is available for anyone to view on DatChat. Pictures stay private with encryption on a private camera roll hidden behind other pictures. Never worry about picture security again.

Download DatChat today to enjoy free, private and secure messaging.

DATCHAT FEATURES:

Secure Chat and Messaging:
- Private chat protects your privacy in online communication
- Messages & posts are protected from screenshots with propriety anti-screenshot protection
- Safety first: Receive notifications when someone attempts to screenshot messages, photos or videos
- Private messages stay between the sender & intended recipients - they can’t be forwarded to others
- Messages have end-to-end encrypted connection

Control Messages:
- Stay safe: control what happens to messages after you send them
- Nuke messages & completely eradicate both sides of a conversation, comments & more
- Messages and posts are self-destructing for your privacy
- Social posts vanish without a trace when they reach a view limit or are manually destructed

Private Messenger Security:
- Create Social Groups for only you & your invited friends to post, comment and like
- Multiple accounts for different friends: messages visible when logged into that respective account

Private Pictures:
- Only a cover photo can be seen in plain sight
- Encryption keeps pictures on a private camera roll, hidden behind other pictures

Download DatChat now & send secure, private messages.
_
We now offer DatChat Pro at three membership tiers:
- Monthly: $0.99, renews every month
- Yearly: $9.99, renews annually
- Lifetime: $24.99, one time purchase good for the life of your account

DatChat Pro is an optional subscription service that unlocks new features and removes existing limitations. Subscriptions are offered on a monthly, yearly and lifetime basis. Monthly subscriptions will renew every month for $0.99. Yearly subscriptions will renew annually for $9.99. A lifetime subscription is a one time payment of$24.99 that does not renew and will upgrade your status to Pro for the lifetime of your account. Prices may vary by location. Any portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription.

Subscriptions are charged to your credit card through your iTunes account. Manage your subscription in Account Settings after purchase. Monthly and Yearly subscriptions must be cancelled at least 24 hours before the end of the current period to prevent an auto renewal. Once purchased, refunds will not be given for any unused portion of the term.

Terms of Service: http://www.datchat.net/terms
Privacy Policy: http://www.datchat.net/privacy
descriptionShort: A Worry Free Messenger for Social Groups to Engage in Private Conversations
